data.actual_result: Welcome message is cropped on devices with smaller screens.
data.expected_result: Welcome message shouldn't be cropped on smaller screen devices
data.short_description: Server welcome message is cropped to the right of the screen [Devices with smaller screen specific aka iPhone 5, 5S and the SE]
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on TestFlight 2.4.0 (9477) - Create a new server and observe the welcome message. (update server icon and invite friends)
